name: Jenny
trans: n. 詹妮(女子名)[Jennifer 的昵称]

name: Canada
trans: n. 加拿大（北美洲国家）

sentences.chinese: 她在加拿大定居。

sentences.chinese: 他在加拿大已经住了二十多年了，现在完全加拿大化了。

trans: n. 手（尤用于与幼儿说话时）；侦察用车

sentences.english: She is married with four children.
sentences.chinese: 她已婚，有四个孩子。

sentences.english: They arrived just after four (= four o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 刚过四点钟，他们就到了。

trans: n. 五，五个；五美元钞票

trans: adv. 结束；越过；从头到尾
prep. 越过；在…之上；遍于…之上

trans: n. （美）年纪教室（学生定期接受导师指导的教室）

trans: v. 参观（visit的现在分词）；拜访

name: show
trans: vt. 显示；说明；演出；展出

sentences.english: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观

sentences.chinese: 他计划先取得经济学学位，然后去国外工作一年。

sentences.chinese: 你周末有什么打算？

sentences.chinese: 他立即开始计划逃跑。

trans: n. 乐趣；玩笑；有趣的人或事

sentences.chinese: 小孩子玩得很开心，我不忍心把他们叫进来。

sentences.english: the school science lab

name: eraser
trans: n. 橡皮；擦除器；[计] 清除器

sentences.chinese: 那是一块橡皮擦。

sentences.english: I have an eraser.
sentences.chinese: 我有一块橡皮。

name: guess
trans: vt. 猜测；认为；推测；猜中

sentences.chinese: 我想他50岁左右，不过也只是猜测。

sentences.chinese: 你是什么星座的？别说，让我来猜猜看。

trans: adj. 第一的；基本的；最早的

sentences.chinese: 中国的长城

sentences.chinese: 我们翻墙进了果园。

trans: aux. 可以，能够；可能，也许；祝，愿；会，能

sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

used to show that you agree with something or give permission for someone to do something
used to show that you agree with something or give permission for someone to do something

trans: vi. 借；借用；从其他语言中引入

sentences.chinese: 我可以借你的笔用一下吗？

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.

sentences.chinese: 我出去一会儿——回头见。

trans: n. 事情；东西；事物；情况

sentences.chinese: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.chinese: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them

sentences.chinese: 雪已经连续下了10天了。

sentences.english: I need to be home by ten (= ten o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我得在10点之前回家。

sentences.chinese: 那时她10岁左右。

sentences.english: six months ago
sentences.chinese: 六个月前

sentences.english: She arrived just after six (= six o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 她六点刚过就到了。

sentences.chinese: 这些女性访问了七个州的城市。

sentences.english: We close the store at seven (= seven o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们商店七点关门。

detailed_translations.english: the number 7
the number 7

sentences.chinese: 他们有一个女儿。

sentences.english: one hundred and twenty-one pounds
sentences.chinese: 121英镑

sentences.english: Come back at one (= one o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 1点钟回来。

sentences.english: Katie’s almost one (= one year old ).

detailed_translations.english: the number 1

sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作才九个月。

sentences.english: We open at nine (= nine o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 我们9点开始营业。

sentences.chinese: 凯一直由她妈妈教到九岁。

sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.english: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.chinese: 我8岁时父母就去世了。

name: sure

sentences.english: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.chinese: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.english: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.chinese: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.english: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

detailed_translations.english: confident that you know something or that something is true or correct

name: blouse
trans: n. 宽松的上衣；女装衬衫

sentences.chinese: 丝质女衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a shirt for women

name: really
trans: adv. 实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）

detailed_translations.english: pale red

name: paint

sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

sentences.chinese: 尽可能有规律地锻炼，可以做运动，或者和家人一起传球玩。

sentences.english: Women who play sports and frequently cycle or swim can also break their hymen, even though they might be virgins.
sentences.chinese: 女性做运动和经常性地骑自行车或游泳都可以让她们的处女膜破裂，即使她们可能是处女。

sentences.english: He liked to hang with the guys and play sports.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢和男友一起打发时间或者做些运动。

name: guessing game
trans: n. 猜谜游戏；捉摸不定的局面

name: Here you are.
trans: [口语]；我们(或你，你们)到了!；这就是我们(或你，你们)所要的东西。

sentences.english: B: Here you are. Anything else?
sentences.chinese: 给你，还要别的什么吗？

sentences.english: Can I eat now? Here you are.
sentences.chinese: 我现在能吃吗？给你。

sentences.english: MR HU:Here you are.You must look after your clothes!
sentences.chinese: 胡老师：给你。 你应该照看好你的衣服!

name: Good afternoon.
trans: int. （下午见面时用语）下午好

name: How many colours do you see?

sentences.english: Oh, look! The sun's coming out!
sentences.chinese: 噢，看！太阳出来啦！

detailed_translations.english: When the sun, moon, or stars come out, they appear in the sky

name: in the sky
trans: 在空中；在天空中；中乃空

name: just right
trans: 恰好, 正好; 不失毫厘; 不差毫发; 初写黄庭

sentences.english: People taking garlic supplements who did catch a cold also had a shorter duration of symptoms and a lower risk of reinfection.
sentences.chinese: 那些吃大蒜的人，他们有感冒症状的持续时间较短，并且传染的风险较低。

sentences.english: You can catch a cold or the flu at any time of year, but it's more prevalent in winter, when we spend more time in close proximity with other people (a.k.a. germ-bearers!) and in warmer, drier air.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一年中的任何时节都会患感冒或者流感，只是在我们与其他人更加亲近（又称为细菌承载体）而且是温暖、干燥的冬季里，这种疾病更加流行。

sentences.english: And if you’re afraid that you’ll catch a cold because someone in the office sneezes, your fear becomes a movement of your own mind that creates what you expect, what you fear and believe.
sentences.chinese: 如果因为办公室的某人打喷嚏，你担心你会患上感冒，那么，你的担心会变成你自己思想的一种趋势，造成你所预期、所担心、所坚信的事件最终发生。

name: ready for ...
trans: 准备好干某事; 准备供（某人、事）用的; 准备应付; 对付

name: go back
trans: na. “Come back”的变体；回来；追溯到；回顾

sentences.english: As for you, go back home.
sentences.chinese: 所以你起身回家去吧。

sentences.english: Once you have some lists you can go back to your tasks by choosing the Tasks option.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你有了这些列表，你就能通过选择任务选项返回到你的任务。

sentences.english: You know, new clothes are best, and so are old acquaintances. I think, you'd better go back.
sentences.chinese: 衣不如新， 人不如旧， 依我看来， 你还是回去好些。

detailed_translations.english: to return

sentences.english: I can eat what I want but I never put on weight.
sentences.chinese: 我想吃什么就能吃什么，而体重从不增加。

detailed_translations.english: If someone puts on weight, they become heavier

sentences.english: I usually go shopping with my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 我通常和我阿姨一起去购物。

sentences.english: She's knitting her husband a pair of socks.
sentences.chinese: 她在给丈夫织一双袜子。

sentences.english: Because of that stool and a pair of computers, I gained a best friend.
sentences.chinese: 因为那个凳子和两台电脑，我得到了一个最好的朋友。

name: stand upon
trans: na. 坚持；【航】向一个方向笔直航行

name: How do you feel?
trans: 你感觉怎么样；你感觉如何；怎么样了

name: What's wrong?
trans: 怎么了；怎么回事；你怎么了

sentences.english: You're hacking these days, you should go to see a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 这几天你总是干咳，你得找医生看一看啦。

sentences.english: If you notice a bad smell or think you may have an infection, see a doctor or gynecologist right away.
sentences.chinese: 如果你发现了身上有难闻的气味，或者你认为自己得了传染病，马上去看医生、或者妇科医生。

sentences.english: But if your symptoms persist—or worsen dramatically—see a doctor!
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你的症状一直持续——或急剧恶化——去看医生吧！

name: Are you OK?
trans: 你还好吗；你没事吧；你还好吧

name: I have a headache.
trans: 我头疼；我头痛；我患有头痛

name: You'd better ...
trans: 你最好；你最好脱掉你的外套；一定来啊

sentences.english: A lot of people think that drinking milk while you have a cold is a bad idea because it causes more mucous to build up.
sentences.chinese: 许多人认为感冒了喝牛奶是不对的，因为这样会在你口腔内积聚更多粘稠液。

name: stay home
trans: 呆在家里；待在家里；留在家中

name: What would you like?
trans: 你想要什么；你想要点什么；你想吃点什么

name: I would like ...
trans: 我想要；我想要一份小的橄榄比萨；我想要某物

name: have to
trans: modalv. 不得不；必须；劝告或建议时用；表示一定真实或肯定发生
v. 不得不；必须；一定；应当

name: Do you want to come with me?
what would you like to buy?
write down
trans: na. 记下来；贬低；减低账面价值；把…拨作公积金

sentences.english: On the morning before starting a diet, write down your starting weight.
sentences.chinese: 早上开始节食前，记下你的起始体重。

detailed_translations.english: When you write something down, you record it on a piece of paper using a pen or pencil

name: How much is ...?
trans: 问价格；某物多少钱；单数名词

name: Would you like ...?
trans: 你愿意；你愿意……吗；你想要---吗

name: corner store
trans: un. 住宅区附近的商店

name: Can I help you?
trans: 我能帮你吗；我能帮助你吗；我能帮你忙吗

name: Let me see.
trans: 让我想想；让我看看；让我想一想

name: take down
trans: na. 扯下；卷起；记下；卸下

sentences.english: Alberto took the portrait down from the wall.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔伯特从墙上取下那幅肖像画。

sentences.english: The Canadian army took down the barricades erected by the Indians.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大军队拆除了印度人设置的路障。

sentences.english: We've been trying to get back to you, Tom, but we think we took your number down incorrectly.
sentences.chinese: 我们一直试着给你回复，汤姆，但我们觉得我们记错了你的号码。

detailed_translations.english: If you take something down, you reach up and get it from a high place such as a shelf

name: be away
trans: 贮藏起来，搁好；离开；不在，缺席

sentences.english: I settled back to watch TV.
sentences.chinese: 我舒适地仰坐着看电视。

sentences.english: Have your dinner before you watch TV.
sentences.chinese: 吃完饭再看电视。

sentences.english: Do you always watch TV in the evening?
sentences.chinese: 你晚上总看电视吗?

sentences.english: He catlicks his face every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天马马虎虎地洗脸。

sentences.english: They mucked up the floor every day.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天都把地板弄脏。

sentences.english: They commute between Beijing and Tianjin every day.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天往返于北京与天津之间。

name: What does she do? She is a ...
on weekends
trans: 在周末；每逢周末；每周末

sentences.english: We should vote on weekends or make Election Day a national holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当在周末投票，或让选举日成为一个国家假日。

sentences.english: It will offer college preparatory classes and leadership courses even on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至将在周末提供大学预备课程和领导能力课程。

name: play football
trans: na. 踢足球；对难办的事采取踢皮球的态度

sentences.english: He likes to play football.
sentences.chinese: 他最爱踢足球。

sentences.english: We're going to play football. Do you want to join in?
sentences.chinese: 我们去踢足球， 你来不来?

sentences.english: As they often play football together, they have got to know each other quite well.
sentences.chinese: 他们常在一起踢足球，一来二去地也就熟了。

name: be ready to ...
trans: 准备好；准备做某事；预备

name: He is ...
trans: 他是；他比我大两岁；通常为形容词

sentences.english: I'd like to go on a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 我想去野餐。

sentences.english: A: Would you like to go on a picnic this Sunday morning?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意星期天上午去野餐吗？

sentences.english: I don't understand why you want to keep the same book every night...oh,well *sigh* "It was a warm spring day,and the six bunny-wunnies decided to go on a picnic...
sentences.chinese: 真不懂你怎麽每晚都读同一本书...好吧，唉！“温暖的春天�，六只宾尼兔打算去野餐...

name: look out
trans: na. 挑选；注意；看外头；展望 (on；over)

name: get off
trans: na. 下车；脱下(衣服等)；脱(衣)；下(马)

sentences.english: That roof is dangerous, do get off.
sentences.chinese: 那房顶太危险，千万要下来。

sentences.english: Excuse me, I have to get off at the next stop.
sentences.chinese: 劳驾，我必须在下一站下车。

sentences.english: Democracy would take us where we wanted to go, not our own effort.Sometimes you have to get off and push.
sentences.chinese: 民主会把我们带到我们想去的地方，但光靠我们的努力还不行，有时候要下车推一推。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下（飞机、火车、公共汽车等）

name: get lost
trans: v. 迷路；迷失；陷入…而忽略了…

sentences.english: A: Yeah.But it’s easy to get lost in the forest and compass is useless there.
sentences.chinese: 是的。 但那里的森林很容易迷路，而且指南针在那儿派不上用场。

sentences.english: Of course, most men have no interest in being there and that is why they get lost in the aisles.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，大多数男人还是对在超市不感兴趣的，这也是为什么他们在过道都会迷路的原因。

sentences.english: It might seem impossible to get lost in the modern world with its ubiquity of digital maps, but there is more than one way to be lost.
sentences.chinese: 在这个到处都有电子地图的现代世界，迷路恐怕不太可能发生了，但我们还是有不只一种会导致迷失的方法。

sentences.english: I never miss breakfast,so I either eat at home or eat on the way to school.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不会不吃早餐，所以我可以在家或在去学校的路上吃早餐。

name: look for
trans: v. 寻找；探索；渴望；盼望

sentences.english: "What should I look for"?
sentences.chinese: 是要我寻找什么吗？

sentences.english: Not only this will happen but you will also look for his slightest mistakes then use them as proofs for what you have been told about him!!
sentences.chinese: 不仅这个将会发生，而且你也会寻找他最轻微的错误，然后将此作为他人告诉你他是怎么样的人的证据。

sentences.english: " so we can look for those features.
sentences.chinese: 这样我们就可以寻找那些特征。

name: Go down this street. Turn left at traffic lights.
May I help you?
trans: 需要帮忙吗；我可以帮助你吗；您要买什么

name: next to
trans: prep. 紧邻；在…近旁；仅次于；紧接

sentences.english: There was a little girl sitting next to him.
sentences.chinese: 有个小女孩坐在他旁边。

detailed_translations.english: very close to someone or something, with no other person, building place, etc in between

name: Yes? What can I do for you?
make noises
trans: 制造嗓音；发出各种声音；发出吵闹声

sentences.english: Well, she won, of course.
sentences.chinese: 噢，当然是她赢啦。

sentences.english: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.english: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.
sentences.chinese: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it

name: on the farm
trans: 在农场；在农场上；在农场里

name: Come on!
trans: na. (演员)出台；进行(很好)；(暴风雨等)起；(病,苦痛等)加深

name: learn about
trans: v. 得知关于；学习关于

sentences.english: Do you go to school by bus or by bike?
sentences.chinese: 你去学校是乘巴士还是骑单车呢？

sentences.english: She usually goes to work by bike except on rainy days.
sentences.chinese: 除了雨天之外， 她总是骑自行车上班。

sentences.english: So the week after Easter we set off by bike on a four-day trip to Wimpfen, Amorbach, and Miltenberg.
sentences.chinese: 因此复活节后那个星期我们骑自行车出发去温普芬，阿莫巴赫和米尔藤贝格进行为期四天的旅行。

name: find out
trans: na. 查出；发现；看清…的面目；识破

sentences.english: It makes you want to watch the next episode to find out what's going to happen.
sentences.chinese: 这使你想看下一集，以弄清接下来要发生什么。

sentences.english: I was relieved to find out that my problems were due to a genuine disorder.
sentences.chinese: 查明我的问题的确是失调造成的，我就放心了。

detailed_translations.english: If you find something out, you learn something that you did not already know, especially by making a deliberate effort to do so

name: How is the weather? It is ...

sentences.english: I often go swimming on weekday.
sentences.chinese: 我经常在周日去游泳。

sentences.english: Where do you go swimming?
sentences.chinese: 你们去哪里游泳呢？

sentences.english: Your grandparents go swimming every day?
sentences.chinese: 你祖父母每天去游泳吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 等于enjoy oneself/have fun(doing sth)玩得痛快

name: count down
trans: na. (9,8,7,… 0 地)倒数；(火箭发射时)倒数秒数

sentences.english: The countdown has begun for the launch of the space shuttle.
sentences.chinese: 航天飞机发射前的倒计时已经开始。

detailed_translations.english: A countdown is the counting aloud of numbers in reverse order before something happens, especially before a spacecraft is launched

sentences.english: In Japan, a boy plays at a Children's Day event outside the Ishinomori Shotaro Manga Museum.
sentences.chinese: 日本，小男孩正在石卷市章太郎漫画博物馆外过儿童节。

sentences.english: Ignorance was young, had rash juvenile; silent over the years in the fingers, when the Children's Day walk in the street, realized that the past does not look back.
sentences.chinese: 曾经年幼无知，曾经莽撞少年；岁月于指间无声滑过，当儿童节走在街头，才意识到过去的日子不回头。

sentences.english: We shall dress the hall up for the National Day.
sentences.chinese: 我们要把大厅布置一新过国庆节。

sentences.english: I give you a special blessing to have it every minute per second gives you health， happiness and good luck and I hope that this is the best that you spend the National Day!
sentences.chinese: 给你我特别的祝福，愿它每分每秒都带给你健康、好运和幸福，希望这是你度过的最美好的国庆节! 愿这短短的话语给你带来国庆的快乐!

sentences.english: My friends and I went to the Fragrant Mount on National Day.
sentences.chinese: 国庆节那天，我和我的朋友们一起去香山游玩。

name: What do you like to do on holidays?
watch a movie
trans: 看电影；看场电影；看一场电影

sentences.english: Ernst comes from Geneva

detailed_translations.english: to be or have been a resident or native (of)

sentences.english: I will not burden you with a lot of questions.
sentences.chinese: 我不会提许多问题来烦扰你的。

sentences.english: If the Workers' Party comes in at the next election a lot of industry will be stateowned.
sentences.chinese: 如果工党能在下次大选登台执政的话，许多工业将变为国有企业。

name: the Great Wall
trans: 长城；万里长城；中国万里长城

sentences.english: You can find everything all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 你能买到全世界所有的东西。
